item.title: RPI Libraries is accepting student applications for evening and weekend shifts!
item.description: Shifts start in January 2026. Review the available shifts in the full announcement and indicate your availability in the online application.

item.title: New Dining Events for Finals!
item.description: Rensselaer Dining has added new events to help you power through final exams. Click the link above to find out more about all the events during finals!

item.title: Spring 2026 Meal Plan Changes
item.description: Students with residential meal plans may request a meal plan downgrade within 7 days of the semester start. For Spring 2026, the deadline is January 18, 2026. Click the link above to find out how to request the change.
item.author: Students

item.title: New at RPI Libraries: Tech & Textile Research Tools
item.description: RPI Libraries is pleased to announce access to two newly added research tools: O’Reilly for Higher Education – A robust collection of e-books, videos, audiobooks, and curated expert playlists spanning technology and business fields, including programming, cybersecurity, project management, communications, and presentation skills. Textile Technology Complete – A full-text database covering the scientific and technological dimensions of textile production and processing.
item.author: Community

item.title: Updated CAS SciFinder security measure
item.description: Starting December 18, 2025, CAS SciFinder will implement a new security measure that may affect users who actively use their ID across multiple devices or browsers simultaneously. (Details are included in the full announcement.)
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Libraries Provides New AI Tools to Boost Your Research & Instruction
item.description: The RPI community has access to ScienceDirect AI, Scopus AI, and Mendeley Reading Assistant through RPI Libraries. RPI is the first U.S. university to adopt both ScienceDirect AI and Scopus AI. Explore these new tools today!
item.author: Community

item.title: LMS - New Navigation Look in 2026
item.description: Part of Blackboards January 2026 update will include a visual refresh for a few navigation areas of the LMS. You will see these changes once our system update is complete either on 8 or 9 January 2026. To see the LMS navigation areas that will be updated, you can read the article published in ITSSC LMS’s New Look for 2026. LMS Team
item.author: Community

item.title: Commons Dining Hall Notice for Thursday December 18, 2025
item.description: Please be advised that Commons Dining Hall will be closed on Thursday, December 18, 2025, from 10:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m. due to a private event. During this time, Russell Sage Dining Hall will remain open and available to serve guests. Thank you for your understanding, and we appreciate your flexibility

item.title: Spring 2026 RPI Faculty and Staff Teaching and Learning Workshops/Webinars Schedule Available
item.description:
The Teaching and Learning Collaboratory has just announced the upcoming trainings for RPI faculty and staff for the Spring 2026 term. Please be sure to visit the training page link below for a listing of sessions, dates, times, and links to register! Visit the Teaching and Learning Collaboratory Workshop page for further details and to register.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
